This package helps you create graphs that follow the e61 Institute graphing style. It provides functions that make it easier to make aesthetic graphs and easy access to the Institute's colour palette.

### Installing theme61

If you haven't already, install the `remotes` package:

`install.packages("remotes")`

Then install from GitHub:

`remotes::install_github("e61-institute/theme61", dependencies = TRUE, upgrade = "always")`

Then load into R:

`library(theme61)`

### Using theme61

See the [package website](https://e61-institute.github.io/theme61/) to learn how to use the package features.
